br.br:
These are the home events for the week:
Monday, March 16
Transportation Committee, 4:35 p.m. ALC Conference Room
Regular Board Meeting, 6:30 p.m., ALC Meeting Space
Tuesday, March 17
Elementary Conferences 3:30 - 7:30 p.m.
High School Conferences 4:00 - 8:00 p.m.
Thursday, March 19
Elementary Conferences 3:30 - 7:30 p.m.
Friday, March 20
Teacher Workshop Day - No school for students
To view the away events for the week go to https://www.graniteridgeconference.org/public/genie/246/school/3/date/2020-03-12/view/week/

These are the home events for the week:
Monday, March 9
Special Board Meeting, 6:30 p.m., ALC Meeting Space
Tuesday, March 10
Building and Grounds Committee, 4:35 p.m., District Office
Finance Committee, 5:15 p.m., District Office
Saturday, March 14
Varsity Speech vs. Multiple Schools, 9:00 a.m.
To view the away events for the week, go to:
https://www.graniteridgeconference.org/public/genie/246/school/3/date/2020-03-04/view/week/

div.p:
Tomorrow is Election Day! Click here to view a sample ballot.
Voting location: Milaca City Hall 255 1st Str

ul.li: Located along the Rum River and Highway 23
Speech, Drama, FFA, Mock Trial, FCCLA clubs
Marching Band, Band and Choir Programs for Grades 5-12
Special Education, ALC and Gifted programming
Before/after care for ½ day Pre-School

div.p: Milaca Schools serves more than 1,800 students from early childhood through grade 12, as well as learners of all ages through our Community Education program. Our size allows for more opportunities and attention to your child’s learning needs. From the day your child starts kindergarten, until they graduate from high school, Milaca Schools will offer outstanding learning experiences.
